name: Occultatia (Demo)
description:
Intro

This is a prototype/mockup in the unity engine that explores the concepts written about here and in the follow-up here! The downloads folder contains both the built game for windows as well as the source assets used to create it, for anyone who wants to extend or modify this project. The work that I have the rights to (i.e. everything except the inspirational art) is hereby released in the public domain.

Controls and Suggested Controller Bindings

I’d recommend using JoyToKey or a similar program to convert controller inputs to key presses, because there is no key rebinding in game. The suggested bindings assume a SNES-controller like layout
